name: cdeqim
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))

stmt.origin: cdeqi(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))

stmt.origin: imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w1, w2, w3)
stmt.pretty: imbi12d(s0 = s1, w0, w1, w2, w3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w1, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3)))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w2))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w1, w3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 →((w0 → w1)↔(w2 → w3)))
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w2))
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))

comment: Distribute conditional equality over implication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
